title: Where’s Wout? Van Aert Back on Bike after Devastating Vuelta Crash and Eyeing Cyclocross Season
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike confirms Van Aert will ride short, select CX campaign after nasty knee injury in build back to spring classics.

Read the full article at Where’s Wout? Van Aert Back on Bike after Devastating Vuelta Crash and Eyeing Cyclocross Season on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
